comment: I expected this class to be difficult, but there was just no way to prepare for her tests because there were so many trick, curveball questions. I got an A because of the sheer ungodly amount of work I did between tests. Wording test questions in such an unfamiliar format compared to her homework & lessons was just an awful way to give exams.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Test heavy

comment: Very difficult class, but very clear notes given daily.  MUST attened class.  She is always very helpful.  If you do all homework and some extras in your book you will be ok.  This is not a cake walk class, you will either learn something or fail. Be aware she will not be walked all over or abused, and your grade reflects your effort.  I loved her!

Professor Leavy is one of the sweetest professors I have ever had.  She is willing to go out of her way to meet with students for extra help, and she emails back with very clear, detailed answers.  However the tests were very difficult for me and most of the rest of the class. This is not an easy class.
Tests are nothing like what she teaches. She counts off for ridiculous things.

She is the WORST teacher ever! I am typically a A/B student but that will not be the case anymore after this case. I agree with the others here. Her tests have nothing to do with her reviews at all! On the tests it's not indicated how much each problem is worth. AVOID HER!

She is the WORST at teaching STATS. All the homework is online, which you think is a good thing but it?s not. She provides study guides but there nothing like the tests and quizzes that she gives. SO WHY DOES SHE PROVIED THEM ANYWAY. Her examples are not clear at all. I?m about to be a sophomore and this is the first C I?m getting...RUN AWAY!!!

She is the nicest teacher I have had yet at college!! Her tests are not like the homework though and I think that they are REALLY hard!! I will be lucky to make a B in this class and I made an A in Precal.

Prof. Leavy is the best Stat teacher KSU has to offer! If you are looking for no challenge, do not take her course! She pushes her students to learn and does not care if you do not try. Her tests are all practical (hence her tests not being like her online homework!) but she does provide necessary knowledge!

This teacher was TERRIBLE! Her personality was fine, but she is a HORRIBLE teacher. Homework and study guide are NOTHING like the test. 3 tests, 1 CUMULATIVE final, lots of homework and quizzes. DO NOT TAKE HER if you want to make a good grade.

STAY AWAY. Tests are NOTHING like the homework and she can't teach. You have to teach yourself in order to pass this class. The only extra credit opportunity is if you have below a C or below you get points if you have good attendance. DO NOT take her.

OMG.. I can not wait for this semester to be over. She is by far the worst math teacher i have ever had. If you do not teach yourself from the homework lessons on MyMathLab you will fail. Period. She throws an answer on the board and expects you to know the answer. Tests and quizzes are nothing like the problems you practice in class. Do not take.

I had professor Leavy this fall (09). She's a Bruce Springsteen loving, hair fluffing woman from New Jersey. Personally, I loved her. 3 tests & 1 cumulative final. There is homework, but don't worry, its online! you can take it as many times as you want & its a breeze! Very helpful gives lots of extra credit! Stats was a great class:) no texting th
